alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 2:43PM CDT until April 30 at 3:41AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt, Kaufman and Rockwall Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 15.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
